stories.text: I am planning to start a vlog/podcast on tech. What all tools and technology do you use for recording, editing, rendering, and publishing?
stories.title: Ask HN: What are your favorite tools for vlog/podcast?
Gutting Decades of Architecture to Build a New Kind of Processor

stories.text:
Did anybody attend DevTernity conference? The line-up is stellar (Robert Martin, Sandro Mancuso, Venkat Subramaniam, J.B. Rainsberger, Allen Holub, Kevlin Henney, Liz Rice…), workshops look promising, yet the price is suspiciously low compared to US counterparts with similar line-up (QCon San Francisco, GOTO Chicago).

Did anybody attend the conference in the past? How was the organization? Any caveats?
stories.title: Ask HN: How Good Is DevTernity?
